SELECT EXER_ID FROM EXERCISE E WHERE E.EXER_NAME=#{exer_name} AND ROWNUM = 1
MERGE INTO EXERCISE E USING DUAL ON (E.EXER_NAME=#{exer_name}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(EXER_ID, EXER_NAME, EXER_TYPE, EXER_DESCRIPTION, SUBCAT_ID, EXER_THUM, EXER_KCAL) VALUES(EXER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{exer_name}, #{exer_type}, #{exer_description}, #{subcat_id}, #{exer_thum}, #{exer_kcal})
mapper.update: UPDATE EXERCISE E SET EXER_NAME=#{exer_name}, EXER_THUM=#{exer_thum}, EXER_DESCRIPTION=#{exer_description}, EXER_TYPE=#{exer_type}, SUBCAT_ID=#{subcat_id}, EXER_KCAL=#{exer_kcal} WHERE EXER_ID = #{exer_id}
